pages.text: > $(n)Health:$() 15  $(br)> $(n)Attack Damage:$() 0    $(br)> $(n)Behavior:$() Passive     $(br)> $(n)Spawn:$() Unknown    $(br)> $(n)Properties:$() $(br)They are healed by $(thing)Instant Damage$() and harmed by $(thing)Instant Health$() effects, are immune to $(thing)Regeneration$() and $(thing)Poison effects$().
